context: On 2024-07-10, an alert was raised for a suspected AD FS DKM key read by the account with email `gsmith@niseko.alpineskihouse.co`. Specifically, gsmith read the DKM key of ADFS object id 4cac49d3-29d3-407e-8c9b-b7ebb21541b2.
question: Relating to this alert, what was the hostname of the device involved in the attempt to hide the use of a dual-purpose tool?
solution_steps: The account with AadUserId `ec3ec68b-fdeb-4fe4-9a29-acd445e1ccc5` read the DKM key of ADFS object id 4cac49d3-29d3-407e-8c9b-b7ebb21541b2.
There was an attempt to hide use of a dual-purpose tool on host `mb-adfs`.
